attributes.action: Create a match of the day for both the Guinness & Magners Rugby Premierships.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would love there to be a Match Of The Day style program that incorporates the days play of both the Guinness and Magners Rugby premierships. After the world cup I really believe this would help the growth of the game in the UK and Ireland. (I doubt it needs any help in Wales!)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
